title: Eartha Kitt 1970s bio "Alone With Me"
content:
I imagine there was never a font created for this face, but if anyone has any idea of the name, publisher, or designer, I would love to hear ideas.  
Thanks.

Font: 

 Motter Ombra 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062455/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [AloneWithMe\_EarthaKitt.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062455/http:/typophile.com/files/AloneWithMe_EarthaKitt.jpg) | 98.05 KB |
author: jaan

comments.content: The book was published in 1976, btw.
I think there is a font, and it's called **[Motter Ombra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062455/http:/www.linotype.com/885035/MotterOmbraStdRegular-product.html)** - it's available from Linotype
